basic.description: In this course, students edit each others' work, discuss critiques in working sessions,ts, and arrive at a final revision of their master's research p revise drafts, and arrive at a final revision of their master's research paper. The papers ideally are ready for presentation at professional meetings or submission to a journal and the seminar also develops students'       skills as writers, critics, and editors.
basic.subject: SYA
basic.title: Reporting Sociological Research
